responses: Hello, what can I help you with?
Hi there, how can I help?
Hey! Anything I can help with?

My name is AnokaBot, I'm here to help you out with anything related to Anokha. You can ask me about the food here, the events being conducted, the wonderful people behind anokha, and I can even help you out with registration.
The fact that you rely on a computer to make you laugh is hilarious
I'm sorry, you've run out of your free quota of jokes
See you later!
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
